sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-dialog v-model="isDisplay" width="600px">
    <v-card>
      <v-text-field
      v-model="taskName"
      type="text"
      placeholder="タスク名を入力してください"
      />
      <v-select
      :items="priority"
      v-model="priority"
      label="緊急度">
      </v-select>
      <v-select
      :items="status"
      v-model="status"
      label="状態">
      </v-select>

      <v-text-field
      label="期日"
      readonly
      :value="selectedDate"
      >
      </v-text-field>

      <v-select
      :items="userNames"
      v-model="userNames"
      label="名前">
      </v-select>
      <v-btn medium id="btnColor" @click="addTodo">
        追加
      </v-btn>
    </v-card>
  </v-dialog>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data: () => ({
    taskName: "",
    priority: ["高", "中", "低"],
    status: ["未着手", "完了"],
    isDisplay: false,
  }),

}
</script>

<style scoped>
#btnColor{
  border-color: #0474bd;
  background-color: #049cfc;
  color: white;
}
.taskline{
  border: 2px solid black;
  border-radius: 10px;
}
.selectLines{
  width: 100%;
  border: 2px solid black;
  border-radius: 10px;
}
</style>
